title: Authentication Vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means being allowed access into the system.

title: MVC Is Important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, divising the code between the Model layer for their data, View layer for desing, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Best 3D CAD Software
content: There are many #D CAD software options. The best I've found so far are: Solidworks, Inventor, and Sketchup. The only free option is Sketchup, you will need to pay for the other two.
